statusLine.command: powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "$input = $input | ConvertFrom-Json; $model = $input.model.display_name; $dir = Split-Path -Leaf $input.workspace.current_dir; $style = if ($input.output_style.name -ne 'default') { "[$($input.output_style.name)]" } else { '' }; Write-Host \"$model in $dir $style\" -NoNewline"
